name: Konoha Guardian:Burning
description:
Perfect recreation of popular characters and reproduction of classic scenes, allowing you to explore the ninja world freely.

Versatile classes and exquisitely-designed gameplays for you to master more ninja arts.

Unlock marvelous challenges and unique PK mode to get rich battle experiences.

Magnificent ninja Ogi introduces awe-inspiring visual impacts. Kill your enemies to win.
